meaningMnemonic: Use your <radical>fingers</radical> to grab this guy's <radical>foot</radical> and <kanji>catch</kanji> him! Not physically though, you do grab his foot, but you close your eyes, and catch the idea of him in your mind just by touching your fingers to his foot.
readingMnemonic: As you touch his foot, you <kanji>catch</kanji> a glimpse of the <reading>Torah</reading> (とら) in your mind. Suddenly, you are able to grasp and understand every single thing written in the Torah. You fall to the ground.
